name: The Watering Can
description:
The Watering Can is all about taking care of the weak plants around the world (indicated by the circle of stones around them).  You can help by watering them, each plant will grow twice.

To pour water simply lean forward in-game by moving your mouse down/back.

Should only take a few minutes to complete.

This is my first published game, all feedback is welcomed, nay requested.

Took me probably 10-12 hours to complete this prototype.
